contents.text: Thank you for calling AdRoll, based in San Francisco, the Growth Platform that unites display, social, and email advertising to drive more revenue with less effort.
For help with your existing AdRoll campaigns and account support, press 1.
For account questions and billing, press 1.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to an account specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to update my billing details and get clarification on last month’s invoice.
I need clarification on unexpected charges in my latest AdRoll invoice.
Review my invoicing details and update my payment method.
I need help understanding my recent invoice
I would like to review and update my billing account information.

contents.text: For technical support with your display, social, or email campaigns, press 2.
Thank you. Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: I want help diagnosing why my email campaign isn’t recording conversions.
I’m experiencing issues with my display ads not tracking properly and need technical assistance.
Resolve pixel tracking errors in my display ad campaign.
I need assistance troubleshooting why my ads aren’t displaying properly
I need technical support troubleshooting my ad campaign analytics.

contents.text: If you’re interested in starting advertising with AdRoll, press 2.
For information on AdRoll’s advertising solutions and demos, press 1.
One moment please. We’ll connect you to our sales team for solutions and demo scheduling.

navigationGoals: I’m exploring your advertising platform and want to schedule a demo.
I’d like to schedule a demo of AdRoll’s advertising solutions for my veteran-owned small business.
Request a demo of AdRoll’s cross-channel ad orchestration platform.
I’d like an overview of AdRoll’s advertising solutions and to schedule a demo
I want to schedule a demonstration of your advertising solutions.

contents.text: For pricing, plans, and package details, press 2.
One moment please. We’ll connect you to a sales representative for pricing and plan details.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review AdRoll’s pricing tiers and select the right plan for our next campaign.
I want to learn about AdRoll’s pricing plans and any available veteran discounts.
Obtain a granular pricing breakdown for AdRoll’s subscription plans.
I’d like information on pricing and available plan options
I would like detailed pricing and plan options for new campaigns.
